title: 20 to 30 Companies in Energy, Tech Space to Grow as Big as Reliance in 10-20 Years: Mukesh Ambani - News18
content: 20 to 30 Companies in Energy, Tech Space to Grow as Big as Reliance in 10-20 Years: Mukesh Ambani  News18
description: The ace businessman said he has immense faith in the ability of India's young entrepreneurs, who are 'highly ambitious and highly talented'.
